statements: SELECT * FROM Farmers WHERE farmer_id = 1;
SELECT farmer_name, crop_rotations FROM Farmers WHERE pesticide_usage = TRUE;
SELECT farmer_name FROM Farmers WHERE organic_certifications = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM Farmers WHERE crop_rotations > 3 ORDER BY farmer_name DESC;
SELECT farmer_name, organic_certifications FROM Farmers WHERE crop_rotations BETWEEN 2 AND 4;
SELECT farmer_name, organic_certifications FROM Farmers WHERE pesticide_usage = TRUE ORDER BY farmer_name ASC
SELECT * FROM Farmers WHERE organic_certifications = TRUE AND crop_rotations > 3 ORDER BY crop_rotations DESC
SELECT farmer_name FROM Farmers WHERE crop_rotations BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY farmer_name ASC
SELECT farmer_name, crop_rotations FROM Farmers WHERE organic_certifications = FALSE ORDER BY crop_rotations DESC, farmer_name ASC
SELECT * FROM Farmers WHERE organic_certifications = TRUE OR crop_rotations > 4 ORDER BY farmer_id ASC
SELECT * FROM Farmers;
SELECT farmer_name, crop_rotations FROM Farmers WHERE pesticide_usage = TRUE;
SELECT certification_name, certification_type FROM Certifications WHERE farmer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Farmers ORDER BY farmer_name DESC;
SELECT farmer_name, crop_rotations FROM Farmers WHERE crop_rotations > 3;
SELECT * FROM Farmers WHERE pesticide_usage = true;
SELECT farmer_name, crop_rotations FROM Farmers WHERE crop_rotations > 3;
SELECT farmer_name, certification_name FROM Farmers JOIN Certifications ON Farmers.farmer_id = Certifications.farmer_id;
SELECT farmer_name, certification_name FROM Farmers JOIN Certifications ON Farmers.farmer_id = Certifications.farmer_id WHERE certification_type = 'Organic';
SELECT farmer_name, certification_name FROM Farmers JOIN Certifications ON Farmers.farmer_id = Certifications.farmer_id ORDER BY certification_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Pesticide_Usage
SELECT farmer_id, pesticide_name FROM Pesticide_Usage ORDER BY application_date DESC
SELECT farmer_id, pesticide_name, application_amount FROM Pesticide_Usage WHERE application_amount > 100 ORDER BY farmer_id ASC
SELECT farmer_id, pesticide_name, application_date FROM Pesticide_Usage WHERE pesticide_name LIKE 'Insecticide%'
SELECT DISTINCT farmer_id FROM Crop_Rotations ORDER BY farmer_id
SELECT * FROM Pesticide_Usage ORDER BY application_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT farmer_id, pesticide_name, application_amount FROM Pesticide_Usage WHERE application_amount > 100 ORDER BY farmer_id ASC, pesticide_name DESC;
SELECT farmer_id, MAX(application_amount) AS max_amount FROM Pesticide_Usage GROUP BY farmer_id HAVING max_amount > 500 ORDER BY farmer_id;
SELECT DISTINCT farmer_id, COUNT(pesticide_name) AS num_pesticides FROM Pesticide_Usage GROUP BY farmer_id HAVING num_pesticides >= 3 ORDER BY num_pesticides DESC;
SELECT farmer_id, pesticide_name, application_date, application_amount FROM Pesticide_Usage WHERE farmer_id = 1001 ORDER BY application_date ASC, application_amount DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM Pesticide_Usage
SELECT farmer_id, pesticide_name, usage_date FROM Pesticide_Usage ORDER BY usage_date DESC
SELECT farmer_name, farm_location FROM Farmers WHERE farm_location = 'California'
SELECT id, certification_name, expiration_date FROM Organic_Certifications WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT farmer_id, crop_name, rotation_date FROM Crop_Rotations ORDER BY rotation_date ASC
SELECT * FROM Farmers;
SELECT farmer_name, farm_location FROM Farmers WHERE farm_location = 'California';
SELECT farmer_name, farm_location, contact_number FROM Farmers ORDER BY farmer_name DESC;
SELECT farmer_name, farm_location, contact_number FROM Farmers WHERE contact_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT farmer_name, farm_location FROM Farmers WHERE farm_location IN ('California', 'New York') ORDER BY farm_location ASC;
SELECT * FROM Farmers;
SELECT farmer_name, location FROM Farmers ORDER BY location;
SELECT farmer_name, farmer_id FROM Farmers WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT * FROM OrganicCertifications WHERE certification_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT crop_name, previous_crop FROM CropRotation WHERE rotation_date < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY rotation_date DESC;
SELECT farmer_name, location FROM Farmers WHERE location='California';
SELECT farmer_name, certification_number FROM Farmers INNER JOIN OrganicCertifications ON Farmers.farmer_id = OrganicCertifications.farmer_id WHERE certification_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT crop_name, previous_crop FROM CropRotation WHERE previous_crop IS NOT NULL ORDER BY rotation_date DESC;

SELECT farmer_name, practice_name, practice_description FROM Farmers JOIN FarmingPractices ON Farmers.farmer_id = FarmingPractices.farmer_id WHERE practice_name LIKE '%organic%' ORDER BY farmer_name ASC;
SELECT pesticide_name, amount_used, date_used FROM PesticideUsage WHERE amount_used > 50 AND date_used BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
